title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5328.6 - Duration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5328.6 - Duration

State Regulations
A casino alcoholic beverage license shall expire two
years from the date of issuance and shall be renewable thereafter for a period
of no less than three years. An application to renew a casino alcoholic
beverage license shall be submitted to the commission at least 30 days prior to
the expiration of the license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5328.6

Adopted

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/28/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
